channel.title: yum on Pictures at an Exhibition
channel.description: Recent content in yum on Pictures at an Exhibition

item.title: Centos6完全删除python、yum并重装
item.description: 删除Python 1 2 3 rpm -qa|grep python|xargs rpm -ev --allmatches --nodeps ##强制删除已安装程序及其关联 whereis python |xargs rm -frv ##删除所有残余文件 ##xargs，允许你对输出执行其他某些命令
